description: A cozy room perfect for solo travelers. It features a comfortable bed, basic amenities, and a serene atmosphere to relax and recharge. Ideal for short stays.
A smaller yet comfortable option for two guests. It includes a double bed and essential amenities for a peaceful stay. Great for couples or friends on a budget.
A spacious room with a larger double bed, offering ample space for two guests. Includes all necessary amenities for a comfortable stay, making it perfect for couples or friends.
Designed for families, this room offers more space and extra bedding options. It features a large bed, additional sleeping arrangements, and family-friendly amenities.
A luxurious suite with premium features, including a king-size bed, elegant d√©cor, spacious living area, and top-tier amenities. Perfect for those seeking an extravagant stay.

The ultimate in luxury, this suite offers unparalleled comfort with exclusive features, including a massive living area, multiple bedrooms, and exceptional service. Ideal for high-end guests looking for the best experience.
